item.description:
Come show your support at Pet Life's grand opening in Danvers, MA this Saturday at 11:00a! Treats, raffles, prizes, food & fun with your pet!

NEBBC will be manning a booth with goodie bags, giving out information, and showing our bully pride! We are honored to participate in this store's grand opening. Pet Life will be selling hamburgers and hot-dogs, the proceeds of which will be split between New England Bully Breed Club & Belgian Rescue!

"Come to the newest Pet Life location, 301 Newbury St., Danvers for all this and more at our Grand Opening on Feb. 27th!"

Visit http://petlifestores.... for more info!

We would love to see you there!
item.name: NEBBC at Pet Life's grand opening in Danvers, MA!
